subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Tayshaun Prince’s 3-pointer with 4.4 seconds left lifted the Detroit Pistons to a 90-89 victory over the visiting Los Angeles Lakers on Thursday night, overcoming Kobe Bryant’s big night.
snippet: Tayshaun Prince’s 3-pointer with 4.4 seconds left lifted the Detroit Pistons to a 90-89 victory over the visiting Los Angeles Lakers on Thursday night, overcoming Kobe Bryant’s big night.
